title: We Are Your Robots
description: A new musical about what happens when a band of robots asks the audience what it really wants from its machines. Directed by Leigh Silverman, featuring music by Ethan Lipton and his bandmates.
address: Polonsky Shakespeare Center: 262 Ashland Place, Brooklyn, NY 11217
cost: $20 for eligible attendees, $65 for others with code SKINT65.
